levels.name: Fun & Light
questions: What’s your go-to comfort food?
If you could instantly master one skill, what would it be?
What’s the weirdest food combination you actually like?
Which movie could you watch 100 times without getting bored?
If money wasn’t an issue, where would you live?
Which song do you secretly love but won’t admit to?
What’s your most used emoji?
If you could swap lives with one person for a week, who would it be?
What’s your dream vacation destination?
Which app do you spend the most time on?

levels.name: Personal
questions: What’s a childhood memory you think about often?
Who has had the biggest influence on your life so far?
What’s a habit you wish you could break?
What’s the hardest decision you’ve ever had to make?
When was the last time you cried, and why?
If you could give your younger self one piece of advice, what would it be?
What’s something you’ve never told your parents?
What’s one insecurity you’re working on?
When do you feel most confident?
What’s the biggest risk you’ve ever taken?

levels.name: Deep
questions: What do you think your purpose in life is?
What’s your biggest fear for the future?
If you could erase one memory, would you?
What’s the most pain you’ve ever felt (physical or emotional)?
Do you believe people can truly change?
What’s a truth you wish you didn’t know?
What’s one thing you hope people will say about you at your funeral?
Who in your life do you feel understands you the most?
If you died today, what would you regret not doing?
What’s a secret dream you’ve never told anyone?

levels.name: Extreme
questions: What’s something you’ve done that you’ve never told anyone?
Who in this room do you trust the least, and why?
What’s the most ashamed you’ve ever felt?
Have you ever betrayed a friend? What happened?
What’s a lie you’ve told that still haunts you?
If you had one year left to live, what would you do differently?
What’s the darkest thought you’ve ever had?
When was the last time you felt truly alone?
If you could send one anonymous message to anyone, what would it say?
What’s one part of yourself you wish you could erase completely?
